name: Portfolio
description: An easy project that lays down the foundation for future projects. They get familiar with good coding practices for both React components and CSS.

name: Vegan restaurant
description: This project allows to further develop clean code practice in a multi page website. Also teaches to write complex JSON files to simulate data coming from an API.

name: Package tracker
description: A project where they switch from a static JSON file to a real API call to obtain and present data from a server.

name: Todo list
description: Practice Test Driven Development testing techniques on a of project that every developer is familiar with, so the student focus on learning unit testing without pressure.

name: E-Commerce
description: An easy project that lays down the foundation for future projects. They get familiar with good coding practices for both React components and CSS.

name: BBQ restaurant
description: An easy project that lays down the foundation for future projects. They get familiar with good coding practices for both React components and CSS.

name: Learning platofrm
description: An easy project that lays down the foundation for future projects. They get familiar with good coding practices for both React components and CSS.

name: Netflix clone
description: The final project that students must complete to graduate from the program. It combines all the techniques mentioned in the Tech stack and also takes into consideration the attention to detail for a polished UI experience.
